task.title: Installing the Oxygen XML Authoring Tool
task.shortdesc: Get started using one of the best XML authoring tools - Oxygen!

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that your computer satisifes the basic system requirements to install the Oxygen XML authoring tool.

context.p: Install the Oxygen XML Authoring Tool (version 25.0 or later).

step.cmd: On a browser instance, type www.oxygenxml.com.

image.alt: Displays a snapshot of what appears on the web page when you choose Products->OxygenXMLAuthor.

step.cmd: On the page, select the tab that corresponds to your operating system, and click Download.

fig.title: Installation -- Download Oxygen XML Author for 64-bit Windows

image.alt: Displays the web page that enables you to download the OxygenXMLAuthor for the 64-bit operating system.

step.stepresult: The .exe file downloads to your system.

step.cmd: Enter the required details in the form provided to obtain your 30-day trial license.

image.alt: Displays the form to enter the required details to obtain the 30-day trial license.

step.cmd: Start the installation wizard to install the Oxygen XML author.
Double-click the Oxygen XML Author shortcut on your desktop to invoke an instance of the tool.
When prompted, enter the 9-line license text in the space provided.
